subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Tim Weinhart, a 42-year-old teaching professional who has been trying to qualify for the U.S. Open since he was 16, has finally earned a place in the tournament. For some, just making the field is a victory.
snippet: Tim Weinhart, a 42-year-old teaching professional who has been trying to qualify for the U.S. Open since he was 16, has finally earned a place in the tournament. For some, just making the field is a victory.
